fulltext:
Nguyen Van Nhan 
Date of birth: 20/08/1994  
Gender: Male 
Phone: 0962 62 67 24 
Email: nhannguyen1494z@gmail.com 
Skype: nhannguyen1494 
Address: Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
July 2016 - Current 
NewSaigonSoft 
Position: Java Developer 
Work description: Participated in building and developing company's products in the field of 
Electronic Government. 
Projects have joined: 
• NeoDoc (Document management software and work profile) 
- Project description: Maintained and customized existing modules and add new modules. 
- Project scale: 6-8 people worked in 18 months. 
- Responsibilities: Developer to implement code of modules based on design document 
provided by customer and coordinate with the tester to test. Optimize SQL Server query 
performance – Statistics, Joins and Index Tuning. Fix bugs by the customer feedback. 
- Technologies: Liferay, Frimefaces, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Jquery, Ajax, Postgres SQL, 
Tomcat, Apache Solr. 
• UserSupportSystem 
- Project description: The building and development of software in the field of logistics for 
customers. Include: Digital signature, Notifications, Data synchronization, Control data from the 
scanner & printer. 
- Project scale: 1 person worked in 2 months. 
- Responsibilities: Developer to implement code of modules based on design document 
provided by customer and coordinate with the tester to test. Fixed bugs by the customer 
feedback. 
- Technologies: Liferay , Websocket, Primeface, Postgres SQL, Tomcat, JavaFX. 
• DataDumpSystem 
- Project description: Dumped data from old version (old software other) to new version (new 
software) for customer. 
- Project scale: 2 people worked in 1.5 months. 
- Responsibilities: Developer do building of modules based on old database provided by 
customer with design document and coordinate with the tester to test. Fixed bugs by the 
customer feedback. 
- Technologies: Liferay, Primeface, Postgres SQL, MySql, SQLServer, Tomcat. 
• NeoCalendar 
- Project description: Maintained and customized existing modules and add new modules. 
- Project scale: 4-6 people worked in 6 months. 
- Responsibilities: Developer to implement code of modules based on design document 
provided by customer and coordinate with the examiner to test. Fixed bugs by the customer 
feedback. 
- Technologies: Liferay , Frimefaces, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Jquery, Ajax, Postgres SQL, 
Tomcat. 
Jan 2016 – Mar 2016 
FPT-SOFTWARE DA NANG 
- Position: INTERNSHIP STUDENT (JAVA). 
- Responsibilities: Web application development. 
- Accomplishments: Attained profound knowledge about Java, Jsp&Servlet, MVC, SQL, 
Bootstrap, Struts1.0.  Analysed application functions.  Reported on daily tasks to the manager 
- Projects (Mockprojects): FastFood Order, Car Management, Nursery School Management 
(Module: People). 
SKILLS 
• Proficient Java EE technologies and frameworks include Liferay Portal, Primefaces, JSF, 
Swing, JavaFX, WebSocket, and basic Struts 1.x/2.x, JSP/Servlet, Spring (Spring MVC, Spring 
Boot), Hibernate. 
• Solid knowledge in web technologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Jquery, Ajax, Bootstrap. 
• Experience with databases: PostgreSQL, SQL Server, My SQL. 
• Report: Jasper report, xDocReport, Apache POI. 
• Version control: SVN. 
• Basic use with RESTful/SOAP web service, JSON, XML. 
• Good understanding some design patterns as Singleton Pattern, Factory Pattern, Prototype 
Pattern... 
• Other programming languages can use: Java/Android, C#/Asp.net, PHP, C. 
• English: Basic communication, good reading and writing ability. 
Other skills:  
• 
Capable of teamwork or work independently in high pressure. 
• 
Has strong logic thinking and problem solving methods. 
• 
Good time management and teamwork skills. 
• 
Ability to adapt quickly to change 
EDUCATION 
Sep 2012 – June 2016 
Quy Nhon University 
  Major: Information technology. 
  Graduated in 2016
